quotes.quote: Hope is being able to see that there is light despite all of the darkness.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: The only way to get through this is together.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, 'I will try again tomorrow.'
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The human spirit is stronger than anything that can happen to it.
quotes.author: C.C. Scott

quotes.quote: What seems impossible today will one day become your warm-up.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who understands your past, believes in your future, and accepts you just the way you are.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Every day may not be good, but there is something good in every day.
quotes.author: Alice Morse Earle

quotes.quote: Strength doesn't come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn't.
quotes.author: Rikki Rogers

quotes.quote: When you come out of the storm, you won't be the same person who walked in. That's what the storm is all about.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: The best way out is always through.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Sometimes the smallest step in the right direction ends up being the biggest step of your life.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: You never know how strong you are until being strong is the only choice you have.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: The struggle you're in today is developing the strength you need for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Progress is not always a straight line. Some days you move forward, some days you rest, and that's okay.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Stars can't shine without darkness.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
quotes.author: Nido Qubein

quotes.quote: The comeback is always stronger than the setback.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Asking for help is not a sign of weakness. It is a sign of wisdom and strength.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: It's okay to not be okay as long as you are not giving up.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: The oak fought the wind and was broken, the willow bent when it must and survived.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: You are not a drop in the ocean. You are the entire ocean in a drop.
quotes.author: Rumi
